name: Dittan & Dattan
description:
This game is my contribution to the LOWREZJAM 2016. It is a simple local-multiplayer, top-down shooter! It is only supported with two gamepads. So make sure to plug those gamepads in before you start shooting! First to 10 winns.

Feel free do download the game for FREE and smash you friends in the couch. Although the game is free to download donations are warmly welcome if you like what I do.

Please give a like on my Facebook page!
